A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was fantastic. I thought that the writing incorporated humor\, satire\, and the emotion very well. I was very pleased with the special effects\, and all of this scenes that it had so much going on. I feel like I could see the movie over and over again and still pick up the new things that are happening in and around the movie. I will definitely be seeing it more and more and more.
